name: SCP 087 B
storyline:
SCP-087 is an unlit platform staircase. Stairs descend on a 38 degree angle for 13 steps before reaching a platform of approximately 3 meters in diameter. Descent direction rotates 180 degrees at each platform. The design of SCP-087 limits subjects to a visual range of approximately 1.5 flights. A light source is required for any subjects exploring SCP-087, as there are no lighting fixtures or windows present. Lighting sources brighter than 75 watts have shown to be ineffective, as SCP-087 seems to absorb excess light.

At this time, it is unknown if SCP-087 has an endpoint.
summary: An SCP-087 remake, which involves a seemingly endless set of descending stairs.
